name: LocalisationManagerKit-iOS
summary: A kit that will be responsible for localising the ui of our kits and apps
description: Read the localisations from a JSON file. One JSON file has the localisations for all language codes. Allow the parent app to set the required language by NSUserDefaults key. If the user provided a missing/wrong JSON file the KIT should handle from the default one not to return keys or nulls. If the parent app didnâ€™t define a specific language, the kit should detect the phone locale and display the language accordingly.
